title: Deadly Virus Vials Go Missing From Australia Lab, Authorities Launch Probe

title: NDTV Exclusive: Glimpse Of An Assad-Free Syria, What The Future Looks Like
content: The fall of Bashar al-Assad's regime has pushed Syria into a new era. The sudden collapse of the regime, in power for over half a century, has left many grappling with the practical and symbolic changes that will shape the future of the country.

title: US Considers New Russia Oil Sanctions To Weaken Putin Ahead Of Trump

title: South Korea Police Launch Second Raid On Presidential Compound: Report

title: US Brothers Charged In Luxury Real Estate Sex-Trafficking Scheme

title: Australia To Force Meta And Google To Pay For News Shared On Platforms

title: Donald Trump Appoints Kari Lake To Head Voice of America
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Wednesday appointed election denier Kari Lake to be the new director of Voice of America, the state-funded international media organization.
